search.js: document.querySelectorAll('form[action=login\\.php]').length == 0 || alert('Not Logged In'); var ee = document.querySelectorAll('a.tLink'); for(var i = 0; i < ee.length; i++) {  var e  = ee[i];  var href = e.getAttribute('href');  href = 'http://pornolab.net/forum/' + href;  e.setAttribute('href', href);}; var ee = document.querySelectorAll('a.dl-stub');for (var i = 0 ;i < ee.length;i++) {  var e = ee[i];  var h = e.innerHTML.replace(/ /ig, ' ');  e.innerHTML = h;};var ee = document.querySelectorAll('a.tLink');for (var i = 0 ;i < ee.length;i++) {  var e = ee[i];  var h = e.innerHTML.replace(/<wbr.*>/ig, ' ');  e.innerHTML = h;}
search.title: a.tLink:regex(]*>(.*))
search.details_js: aa=document.querySelectorAll('a.dl-stub'); for(i=0;i<aa.length;i++){ a=aa[i];h=a.getAttribute('href'); a.setAttribute('href','#'); id=h.split('t=')[1]; function c(){t='bb_dl='+id; document.cookie=t; location.href=h}; a.onclick=c}
